Generate the HTML div fragment for the scroll document

Source: R/scroll_section.R
scroll_section.Rd

This is designed to be used with parse_md() and purrr::pmap_chr() to generate a HTML fragment for generate_scroll_doc(). For the typical usage, you should not need to use this function directly. This is exported for transparency reasons.

scroll_section(content = "right", position, imgurl)

Arguments

content

character. Content in HTML

position

character. Valid values include "right" (default) or "left".

imgurl

character. URL string for the image to be displayed.

Contents

Developed by Martin Chan.
